application_instruction: Note: By applying to this position your application is automatically submitted to the following locations: New York, NY, USA; Chicago, IL, USA
description:
gTech’s Professional Services team takes a creative, collaborative, and customer-centric approach to provide foundational services and forward-looking business solutions to top advertiser and publisher customers. Through technical implementation, optimization, and key solutions, gTech Professional Services helps customers attain their business goals while building long-term capabilities.

Google’s Professional Services Technical Specialist advance the technical capabilities of the world’s largest brands. Partnering with sales leaders across Google’s advertising ecosystem, our team of trusted experts bring thought leadership, analytical skills and technical expertise to bear on addressing complex business challenges with cutting edge technology. We understand our customers’ business goals and work in partnership with them to develop detailed technical plans, setting the strategy for cross-functional teams of technologists to execute on a shared vision.

As an Technical Specialist, you’ll develop and deliver on technical consulting projects for Google’s largest advertisers using our Platforms suite of technologies. You’ll also be delivering scaled, proactive, cross-vertical solutions and workarounds for both clients and internal partners. You are analytical, flexible, and creative, have superb communication and technical acumen and can work in a constantly evolving environment.

Google creates products and services that make the world a better place, and gTech’s role is to help bring them to life. Our teams of solution-oriented trusted advisors support millions of customers globally. Our solutions are rooted in our technical skill, product expertise, and a thorough understanding of our customers’ complex needs. Whether the answer is a bespoke solution to solve a unique problem, or a new tool that can scale across Google, everything we do aims to ensure our customers benefit from the full potential of Google products.

To learn more about gTech, check out our video.
eeo: At Google, we don’t just accept difference—we celebrate it, we support it, and we thrive on it for the benefit of our employees, our products and our community. Google is proud to be an equal opportunity workplace and is an affirmative action employer. We are committed to equal employment opportunity regardless of race, color, ancestry, religion, sex, national origin, sexual orientation, age, citizenship, marital status, disability, gender identity or Veteran status. If you have a disability or special need that requires accommodation, please let us know by completing this form.
qualifications:
Minimum qualifications:

  • Bachelor's degree or equivalent practical experience.
  • 5 years of experience in professional consulting, sales engineering or technical sales.
  • Experience with managing technical projects and coordinating team members to deliver results within the project deadlines.
  • Experience with discussing analytical technologies (i.e., query language and databases).

Preferred qualifications:

  • Proficiency in online advertising technology, such as ad serving and demand-side platform (DSP), online measurement and Google display buying, delivery and measurement platforms.
  • Ability to navigate through ambiguity and independently lead projects to a successful and timely conclusion by prioritizing and handling multiple client and stakeholder deadlines in a dynamic environment.
  • Ability to understand complex technical concepts and communicate them to a non-technical audience effectively.
  • Technical aptitude to learn new products and features, to evaluate customer needs and to recommend technical solutions.
responsibilities:
• Develop trusted relationships with senior decision-makers at the C-level of Google’s largest advertising clients, establishing a technical roadmap that accomplishes our joint business plans.
  • Understand the business objectives of our clients, overcome technical constraints and develop actionable, results-oriented strategies for complex, ambiguous, open-ended business problems.
  • Partner with cross-functional teams internally, develop implementation plans, build and deliver scaled solutions for Google’s Ads Platform clients.
  • Become a subject-matter expert in Google’s Ads Platform and communicate all technical aspects of products to internal and external stakeholders.
title: Technical Specialist
